name: Coronavirus (div72)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Year 2019, a dangerous coronavirus of unknown origin (laboratory or bat) suddenly appears. Soon the population has to be confined. After months of investigation against the clock, several vaccines are created.

Your mission is to avoid viruses and collect all the vaccines to end the pandemic.

HOW TO PLAY WUpSDownOLeftPRightDTo choose the speed of the game: Low, Normal, High, Impossible (default Normal)E Start the game AUTHORS AND LICENSES

Programming, graphics and music: Diego Izquierdo Villar

The game has been developed in C using the 8BP library wrapper. 

Note: a first version of the game was made in BASIC using the 8BP library. Then it was switched to C and its development continued.

To make this game possible I used the following software:

8BP library:  8BP library developed by Jose Javier García Aranda

WinAPE:  An Amstrad emulator for PCs running  Windows

RGAS: Allows the creation of graphics for retro game platforms

GESTURE

In the game you can catch a rainbow (gesture to Rainbow Islands) that will give you an extra life.

HOW TO RUN THE GAME USING WINAPE

DSK file: File -> Drive A: -> Insert Disc Image

Select file  corona.dsk

run "LOADER.BAS"
